name: opabid2ss
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0
body: |- wss(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), c0)

stmt.origin: opabssi(s0, s1, c0, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
stmt.pretty: opabssi(s0, s1, c0, < s0, s1 > ∈ c0)

body.origin:
|- wss(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), c0)
-| wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

-| diffsc(s1, c0)

comment: One direction of ~ opabid2 which holds without a ` Rel A ` requirement. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Feb-2022.)
